name: Space Aces Supplemental: The Trouble With Stasis Pods
name_original: Space Aces Supplemental: The Trouble With Stasis Pods
description:
They said the mission would be a "milk run" but the trouble with stasis pods is that you never know what you are going to find when you come out...

This supplement provides 64,000,000 different things that could happen when exiting stasis in just 6 rolls of the d20.

Space Aces: The Trouble With Stasis Pods is an excellent starting scenario generator for a crew to kick off their adventures together in Outer Space.

Quickly roll up a setting, a mystery, a twist, and an emergency in what is sure to be most memorable trip (hopefully not one way...) all for the price of FREE (or PWYW)!

If you like this supplement don't miss Space Aces: Voyages In Infinite Space funding now on Kickstarter for an entire galaxy of adventure at your fingertips!
